name: Learn Irish Tunes
description: Learn to play traditional Irish tunes in a natural and effective way!  Each tune is split into phrases and bars. The application walks you through them step by step. You listen to, play along and repeat each phrase in selected tempo until you feel comfortable playing it, then move to the next one. You can select from 4 predefined tempos, from the slowest to the fastest.  Application contains over 100 of the most famous and popular traditional Irish tunes - reels, jigs, slip jigs, slides, hornpipes and polkas. Each tune contains both sheet music and ABC notation. Doesnt matter whether you are tin whistle or fiddle player, this app is made to be useful for everyone.  The app also keeps progress of your learned tunes, so you will never forget the tunes you have learned.  Tune list:  A Fig For A Kiss Banish Misfortune Bill Sullivans Bill The Weavers Chief ONeills Favourite Comb Your Hair And Curl It Cooleys Cronins Danny Abs Denis Murphys Dennis Doodys Dever The Dancer
